module.name: AvgLvlTree
module.short: An Average Level Tree structure, which is kept balanced so that finding a node is very rapid

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode
element.short: TAvgLvlTreeNode - a node, the basic structural element of a TAvgLvlTree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Parent
element.short: Parent - the previous level in the tree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Left
element.short: The Left descendant branch node in the tree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Right
element.short: The Right descendant branch node in the tree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Balance
element.short: Balance - should be 0 for perfect balance, -1 or +1 for one extra node on either side, more than (+ or -) 1 means tree is unbalanced and needs to be fixed

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Data
element.short: A pointer to the actual Data associated with the node

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.Clear
element.short: Clear - remove all the branches leaving an empty tree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNode.TreeDepth
element.short: TreeDepth - the number of levels in the tree structure, by the longest way down

element.name: PAvgLvlTreeNode
element.short: PAvgLvlTreeNode - pointer to a TAvgLvlTreeNode

element.name: TAvgLvlTree
element.short: TAvgLvlTree - an Average Level binary Tree
element.descr: TAvgLvlTree is an Average Level binary Tree. This binary tree is always balanced, so that inserting, deleting and finding a node is performed in O(log(#Nodes))

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Root
element.short: Root - the starting node of the tree structure

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Compare
element.short: Compare two data. For every two nodes of the tree holds: Compare(Left,Right)

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Find
element.short: Find node with a Data of the same key. The found Node.Data need not be the same as the Data parameter.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindKey
element.short: Search a node with the same key. OnCompareKeyWithData first parameter is the key, second the Node.Data.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindSuccessor
element.short: Find the next node to the right with the next higher value.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindPrecessor
element.short: Find the next node to the left with the next lower value.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindLowest
element.short: Find the left most node.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindHighest
element.short: Find the right most node.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindNearest
element.short: Find a node with the same key. If no node with exact the same key exists a node left or right is returned.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindPointer
element.short: As Find, but Key and Data must be the same.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindLeftMostKey
element.short: As FindKey, but if there are several nodes with the same key, the left most is returned

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindRightMostKey
element.short: As FindKey, but if there are several nodes with the same key, the right most is returned

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindLeftMostSameKey
element.short: Starts at ANode and returns the left most node with the same key as ANode.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindRightMostSameKey
element.short: Starts at ANode and returns the left most node with the same key as ANode.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Add
element.short: Adds a node to the tree

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Delete
element.short: Removes and frees a node. The data is not freed (See FreeAndDelete).

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Remove
element.short: if the Data with the same key exists one node is removed.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.RemovePointer
element.short: RemovePointer - if the Data with the same pointer exists one pointer is removed.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.MoveDataLeftMost
element.short: If there are several nodes with the same Key as ANode, the node is moved left most of this group.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.MoveDataRightMost
element.short: If there are several nodes with the same Key as ANode, the node is moved right most of this group.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.OnCompare
element.short: OnCompare - user-supplied event handler to define your own sorting. The tree will be rebuilt without losing data.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.OnObjectCompare
element.short: Same as OnCompare, but with a method instead of a procedure.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Clear
element.short: Delete all nodes without freeing the data. Calls Clear then performs inherited Destroy

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FreeAndClear
element.short: Delete all nodes and call TObject(Node.Data).Free on every data.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FreeAndDelete
element.short: Call TObject(ANode.Data).Free then delete the node.

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Count
element.short: Count - number of nodes

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.ConsistencyCheck
element.short: ConsistencyCheck - checks that the root node exists and that the tree is correctly balanced with valid nodes on each level

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.WriteReportToStream
element.short: WriteReportToStream - sends a status report to the current data stream

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.ReportAsString
element.short: ReportAsString returns the status report sent to the stream, as a string

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TAvgLvlTree, allowing the comparison method to be passed as an argument. Performs Inherited Create and copies the specified comparison method to a local variable

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Create
element.short: Version of the Create constructor without specified arguments

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TAvgLvlTree:

element.name: PAvgLvlTree
element.short: PAvgLvlTree - a pointer to a TAvgLvlTree

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager
element.short: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager - memory manager for TAvgLvlTree nodes

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.DisposeNode
element.short: DisposeNode - method for disposal of a node when it is no longer needed

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.NewNode
element.short: NewNode - returns a new node fo the structure

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.MinimumFreeNode
element.short: MinimumFreeNode the value of the smallest (or next) free node

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.MaximumFreeNodeRatio
element.short: MaximumFreeNodeRatio - the maximum allowable ratio of free nodes

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.Count
element.short: Count - the running total of nodes

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.Clear
element.short: Clear - remove all the nodes and leave an empty structure

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager: calls inherited Create then initialises the counters

element.name: TAvgLvlTreeNodeMemManager.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for memory manager: calls Clear then performs inherited Destroy

element.name: TAvgLvlTree.FindNearestKey
element.short: Same as FindKey, but if the exact Key can not be found a Node left or right of it is returned.

element.name: TPointerToPointerItem
element.short: TPointerToPointerItem - an item in a PointerToPointer Tree (associative array)

element.name: TPointerToPointerItem.Key
element.short: The Key defining the pointer item

element.name: TPointerToPointerItem.Value
element.short: The Value of the pointer item

element.name: PPointerToPointerItem
element.short: PPointerToPointerItem - a pointer to a TPointerToPointerItem

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree
element.short: TPointerToPointerTree - an associative array of PointerToPointer Items, or a tree of trees
element.descr: TPointerToPointerTree - an associative array of PointerToPointer Items, or a tree of trees. This class uses pointers to identify pointers within the array, unlike the TStringToStringTree, which uses strings to identify strings.

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TPointerToPointerTree. Calls the TAvgLvlTree.Create method

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TPointerToPointerTree: Clear the tree, Free the items then call inherited Destroy

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Clear
element.short: Clear - removes each node from the tree, leaving an empty tree

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Remove
element.short: Remove the node specified by Key from the tree

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Contains
element.short: Returns True if the tree Contains the node specified by Key

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.GetFirst
element.short: GetFirst - finds the first node matching the supplied arguments; returns True if successful

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.GetLast
element.short: GetLast - finds the last node matching the supplied arguments; returns True if successful

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.GetNext
element.short: GetNext - finds the next node matching the supplied arguments; returns True if successful

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.GetPrev
element.short: GetPrev - finds the previous node matching the supplied arguments; returns True if successful

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Count
element.short: Count - the number of items

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Values
element.short: Values - a pointer into the array of values associated with the nodes

element.name: TPointerToPointerTree.Tree
element.short: The Tree that forms the basis of the associative array

element.name: TStringToStringTree
element.descr: TStringToStringTree - an associative array of StringToString Items, or a tree of trees. This class uses strings to identify strings within the array, unlike the TPointerToPointerTree, which uses pointers to identify pointers.
element.short: TStringToStringTree - an associative array of StringToString Items, or a tree of trees

element.name: TStringToStringItem
element.short: TStringToStringItem - an item in a StringToString Tree (associative array)

element.name: TStringToStringItem.Name
element.short: The Name that identifies the string within the associative array

element.name: TStringToStringItem.Value
element.short: The Value of the string held within the associative array

element.name: PStringToStringItem
element.short: PStringToStringItem - pointer to a TStringToStringItem

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Create
element.short: The instance of the Create constructor that allows the programmer to specify whether or not the string operations are to be Case Sensitive

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Create.CaseSensitive
element.short: CaseSensitive - if True, string operations (comparisons etc) must be case sensitive

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Create
element.short: The instance of the Create constructor that allows the programmer to specify how items in the list are to be compared

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TStringToStringTree: calls Clear, frees items then calls inherited Destroy

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Clear
element.short: Clear - removes all items leaving an empty tree

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Contains
element.short: Returns True if the tree Contains the specified string

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Add
element.short: Add an item to the tree (specified by its name, value or delimiter)

element.name: TStringToStringTree.AddNameValues
element.short: AddNameValues add the specified named values to the tree

element.name: TStringToStringTree.AddValues
element.short: AddValues - adds the specified values to the tree

element.name: TStringToStringTree.GetFirst
element.short: GetFirst - finds the matching first item; returns True if successful

element.name: TStringToStringTree.GetLast
element.short: GetLast - finds the last matching item; returns True if successful

element.name: TStringToStringTree.GetNext
element.short: GetNext - finds the next matching item; returns True if successful

element.name: TStringToStringTree.GetPrev
element.short: GetPrev - finds the previous matching item; returns True if successful

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Count
element.short: Count - the number of items

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Values
element.short: The Values of the strings corresponding to the supplied name

element.name: TStringToStringTree.Tree
element.short: The Tree that forms the basis of the associative array

element.name: TStringToStringTree.CompareItems
element.short: CompareItems - the items for comparison

element.name: TStringToStringTree.CompareNameWithItem
element.short: CompareNameWithItem - the name for comparison with the item
